extendedInfo.description: Time to Die is a dice rolling app, especially for tabletop gamers of Dungeons and Dragons, Warhammer etc... It's 2D, easy to see and use, and does a lot of the work for you."Time to Die is unarguably one of the best apps ever made." - Me, 2012"5 Stars, at least. Worth every penny." - also Me, 2012 Features:- Free with NO adverts- Up to 1024 dice in any combination- 8 dice types:    - D3    - D4    - D6    - D8    - D10    - D12    - D100- 4 Modes:    - Normal    - Remove Fails    - Show Total    - Warhammer- Awesome sound effects- Unbelievable graphicsFeedback/Comments/Insults/Suggestions appreciated.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I love this! Any TT gamer should check this out. I won\'t have to pack all my dice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ParaDICE - this app will take you there.
reviews.comment: Love the warhammer mode, tis especially awesome. Make sure you dig through all the various options this app has, there are more than it first seems.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea but.....
reviews.comment: Not dynamic enough for actual game play. I can just imagine my opponent telling me to just grab some bloody dice while they wait for me to go through the menus to select the dice I need. Needs to be able to use the main screen to select what dice, how many, etc....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app. huge time saver.  for future enhancements I would like to see a back button (for when you accidentally move forward ) and along the same lines a roll button instead of using the whole screen area for that function. on a small screen these are issues but would not be an issue at on on a tablet of any size.
reviews.author: Chris Voth

reviews.comment: I\'m glad I DICEided to download this app
reviews.author: A Google User
